name: Save Candy
description:
You are in world where you should save some candies from cute monsters.

It was a simpl life till these monsters came to eat our magic candies, so the leaders gave me cannon and they said that I must protect candies or we all will lose our home,I don't know why but I think I will know in the futur but now I will show these monsters what I can do and my skill in this world.
It is a shooting game.
when you made a high score the game become more fast and for that you must be good player
